results.title: UVA President Steps Down Amid Pressure from Trump Administration
results.description: (MENAFN) James Ryan, President of the University of Virginia (UVA), has agreed to step down following mounting pressure from the Trump administration, media reported on Friday. The U.S. Department ...

results.title: Flamengo Gerson is the target of a dispute between Cristiano Ronaldo’s Al-Nassr and Zenit for R$160 million
results.description: In a move shaking up the transfer market, Flamengo’s midfielder Gerson has become the center of an international tug-of-war between Saudi Arabia’s Al-Nassr and Russia’s Zenit, with his €25 million (approximately R$160 million) release clause at the heart of negotiations. The Saudi club, led by Portuguese coach Jorge Jesus, who is close to signing with [...]O post Flamengo Gerson is the target of a dispute between Cristiano Ronaldo’s Al-Nassr and Zenit for R$160 million apareceu primeiro em Mix Vale.

results.title: Where to watch Flamengo vs Bayern live: decisive duel in the Club World Cup shakes up Miami this Sunday
results.description: Flamengo and Bayern Munich face off this Sunday, June 29, 2025, at 5:00 PM (Brasília time), in a thrilling round of 16 match of the 2025 Club World Cup at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami.
